channel.title: Server Sites Video Metal Games on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in Server Sites Video Metal Games on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: i am listening to some awesome music.
item.description: i think the mix is grave diggaz, front line assembly, himsa, bleeding through and fischerspooner. haha. it rules. it is also a lot better on shuffle. ;) I love mp3s. last night all I did was play video games. I played gish for about an hour - it is a lot of fun. I enjoyed the motif quite a bit. I do wish it really looked like the still graphics look.
